result.eng: Do you eat meat on Fridays?

result.eng: Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ga: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.orig: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cumannaċas ar an dé deiriḋ i 1989Communism was on its last legs in 1989.

result.eng: That is the word of God.

result.html: Sin briathar DéThat is the word of God.
result.ponchtml: Sin briaṫar DéThat is the word of God.

result.eng: What did you do on Sunday?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú Dé Domhnaigh
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú Dé Domhnaigh
result.html: Cad a rinne tú Dé DomhnaighWhat did you do on Sunday?

result.eng: We went out on Saturday.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid amach Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Chuaigh muid amach Dé Sathairn
result.html: Chuaigh muid amach Dé SathairnWe went out on Saturday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid amaċ Dé SaṫairnWe went out on Saturday.

result.eng: In the name of God!
result.ga: In ainm Dé
result.orig: In ainm Dé
result.html: In ainm DéIn the name of God!
result.ponchtml: In ainm DéIn the name of God!

result.eng: Today is Monday.
result.ga: Inniu Dé Luain
result.orig: Inniu Dé Luain
result.html: Inniu Dé LuainToday is Monday.
result.ponchtml: Inniu Dé LuainToday is Monday.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: The course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ga: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.html: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SathairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an cúrsa críoċnaiṫe tráṫnóna Dé hAoine agus beiḋ mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SaṫairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.orig: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.html: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: Cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.orig: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.html: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé oíċe Aoine ṫú le cúnaṁ DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.

result.eng: Would you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat dul chuig ceolchoirm liom Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat dul chuig ceolchoirm liom Dé Sathairn
result.html: Ar mhaith leat dul chuig ceolchoirm liom Dé SathairnWould you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat dul ċuig ceolċoirm liom Dé SaṫairnWould you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?

result.eng: Tuesdays I go out to throw darts.
result.ga: Dé Máirt téim amach ag caitheamh saighead
result.orig: Dé Máirt téim amach ag caitheamh saighead
result.html: Dé Máirt téim amach ag caitheamh saigheadTuesdays I go out to throw darts.
result.ponchtml: Dé Máirt téim amaċ ag caiṫeaṁ saiġeadTuesdays I go out to throw darts.

result.eng: Do you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé Máirt
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé Máirt
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé MáirtDo you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag caiṫeaṁ saiġead gaċ aon oíċe Dé MáirtDo you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?

result.eng: I never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.
result.ga: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná Déardaoin
result.orig: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná Déardaoin
result.html: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná DéardaoinI never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫéim amaċ ċoíċe Dé Céadaoin ná DéardaoinI never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.

result.eng: What do you usually do on Friday?
result.ga: Cad a bhíonn ar siúl agat Dé hAoine
result.orig: Cad a bhíonn ar siúl agat Dé hAoine
result.html: Cad a bhíonn ar siúl agat Dé hAoineWhat do you usually do on Friday?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ḃíonn ar siúl agat Dé hAoineWhat do you usually do on Friday?

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.orig: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.html: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ponchtml: Dé Doṁnaiġ bím ag obair - ag déanaṁ réiḋ don tseaċtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.
result.ga: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.orig: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.html: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.
result.ponchtml: Siḃse ar a ḃfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.

result.eng: I remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.html: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadhI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom dúiseaċt maidin Dé Doṁnaiġ agus mé ag caoineaḋI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
